Talk_0041:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Ah, Link! Might you be heading out?<sp:5:0:0>


Right when the night monsters begin
to rouse. Brave of you, as always.
Talk_0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hyrule has eight major places that its
various peoples call home.
Talk_0042: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Ah, Link!<sp:5:0:0> Will you be heading out?
Talk_0043:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Thank you for all you do.


While we're stunned that the Demon King
is back, we won't allow it to dampen the
spirits of the monster-control crew!
I imagine you may be heading out shortly.
Talk_0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I work with the monster-control crew.<sp:0:4:0>We're tasked with protecting everyone
from monsters. There's been an uptick in
their populations since the Upheaval.
But I'm not really the most skilled
in combat.<sp:0:4:0>So instead, I use my knowledge of the
areas to help determine where we should
make deployments.
Talk_0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand>There's been an increase in the number of
<clr:0000>unfamiliar monsters<clr:ffff> since the Upheaval,
as well. Be careful out there.
Talk_0044:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh! If you're interested, I'm happy to
oblige you!
Talk_OnTheDesk:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You can see the map better from up there.
I do that myself when no one is watching!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>But there are some important documents
laid out too, so please watch your step.
Talk_0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm quite confident in my knowledge of
Hyrule's <clr:0000>peoples and places<clr:ffff>.

So if there's anything you're wondering
about its <clr:0000>various peoples <clr:ffff>or their
<clr:0000>towns and villages<clr:ffff>, please ask!
Talk_0045:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If you're curious about them, I'm happy to
indulge that curiosity!
Talk_0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Ah, Link! Will you be leaving?<sp:5:0:0>


Smart thinking, taking off when the night
monsters go to sleep. Just as I'd expect.
Talk_0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Up northwest of here, there's Rito Village
in <clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0046:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Trouble>Well... I don't like to talk about myself
that much, buuut...

I'm with the monster-control crew.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Our role is to keep everyone safe, what
with the rise in monster attacks after
the Upheaval.
But I'm not a warrior at heart.<sp:0:4:0>I use my knowledge of the peoples and
places of Hyrule to help the monster-
control crew deploy its forces.
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You'll find Goron City to the northeast
in <clr:0000>Eldin<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0047:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand>Now that the Gerudo have come to offer
their support, Lookout Landing has
stronger defenses than ever before.
Even so...there's been an increase in the
number of <clr:0000>unfamiliar monsters<clr:ffff> since
the Upheaval. Be careful out there.
Talk_0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Travel a bit farther east, and you'll come
across Tarrey Town in <clr:0000>Akkala<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0048:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand>Thanks to you, Link, things have gotten
very busy here! It's become quite the hub
for everyone.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>All the people of Hyrule are banding
together, and united we can stand against
any threat, including the Demon King!
Talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Not too far from there is Zora's Domain.
That's within the <clr:0000>Lanayru<clr:ffff> region.
Talk_0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Lookout Landing is located here in
Central Hyrule.
Talk_0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>Continuing into southeast Hyrule, you'll
come across a cluster of Hylian villages.
These are within an area called <clr:0000>Necluda<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Within that cluster, you'll find Kakariko
Village, where the <clr:0000>Sheikah <clr:ffff>live.<sp:5:0:0> I hear the
village leader is quite lovely.
Talk_0039:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Ah, Link! Good morning!<sp:5:0:0> Will you be
heading out?
Talk_0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Then there's Gerudo Town. That's located
to the southwest in the <clr:0000>Gerudo<clr:ffff> region.
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Hm?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b00>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> It's you, Link! Pardon me for being
lost in my work here. This <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff> tends
to get all my attention.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Are you interested in the different
peoples of Hyrule and where they live?
That's my entire field of study.
When I'm out on a deployment with the
monster-control crew, I spend hours
poring over our maps.
As such, I'm the most knowledgeable in
Lookout Landing about Hyrule's <clr:0000>various
peoples<clr:ffff> and their <clr:0000>towns and villages<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you're seeking a tranquil spot, Hateno
Village is worth a visit.<sp:5:0:0> I also hear it's
become Hyrule's <clr:0000>center of fashion<clr:ffff>!
Talk_0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Finally, there's Lurelin Village. It's a
wonderful getaway destination.<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Many of the aforementioned towns and
villages have been deeply affected by
the Upheaval.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If removing even a fraction of the
monsters helps soothe the peoples of
Hyrule, then that's what we'll do.
Our monster-control crew is on patrol
each day, gathering information from
everyone...<sp:5:0:0>everywhere.
Talk_0040:
It would be a complicating factor if you
get lost during your travels. Please make
sure to check your <clr:0000>destination<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Aside from us Hylians, there are four
other peoples here in Hyrule.

The Rito,<sp:5:0:0> the Gorons,<sp:5:0:0> the Zora,<sp:5:0:0> and
the Gerudo.

Each live in a different area and have their
own unique traitsâ€”whether it's soaring
the sky or feasting on rocks.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We Hylians also live in villages that
reflect our unique cultures.

The <clr:0000>Sheikah<clr:ffff> are renowned for their
wisdom. In fact, our most prolific
researchers are among them.
The leader of Lookout Landing, Purah,
is from the Sheikah tribe.
